import useAuth from "../../context/userContext/useAuth"; export const MyAccount = () => { const { user, message, error, logout } = useAuth(); return (

{user ? user.username : " "}

{user ? user.email : " "}

{message ? (
{message}
) : null} {error && (
{error}
)}
); };
